interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: O!GETi Vitamin C Foam Cleanser | Foaming Facial Cleanser, Perfect Pore Cleansing Foam, Face Wash for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Sebum Reducing, Moisture Control & Minimizing Pores, Korean Skin Care, Gift for Women, Paraben-free, 4.23 Oz (120g)
Review Date: 2021/05/21
Store: O!GETi
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'O!GETi', 'Scent': 'Tangerine', 'Material Feature': 'Natural'}
Review Text: This cleanser is so smooth and silky on my face. It has a *very* faint citrusy scent, which I like as it's not overbearing at all. I am using this every morning before I put on my moisturizer and spf and have no complaints! Great ingredients list as well.
Review Title: No Complaints!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Women's Pleated Scarves Pashmina Shawl Wraps for Wedding Bride Bridesmaid Gifts (Black) HOMELEX {'Package Dimensions': '12 x 10.7 x 0.8 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'Department': 'Womens', 'UPC': '782903598692'} So happy I added this to my headscarf collection. I got the black one but am definitely eyeing up the champagne, brown, and yellow! The fabric is so soft and I love the pleated design. It's pretty long, which allows so many styles to be worn! It could even work as a scarf around your neck! Very versatile. Beautiful & Versatile Laloirelle Age Defy Face Oil - Virgin Marula Oil, Rosehip Oil Infused with Organic Reishi Mushroom, Ginseng, Cordyceps Mushroom - Organic Facial Oil for Anti Aging, Wrinkles, Acne Scars, Dry Skin (1oz) Laloirelle {'Brand': 'Laloirelle', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.4 x 2.32 inches; 4.52 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AD30'} I'm a fan of this face oil. I find that I can only really use it as part of my nighttime skincare routine, as the finish is...well...oily. I have another face oil that I use in the morning that has more of a matte finish so I'm not shining all throughout the day. That being said, this oil is not bad. It just leaves you very shiny!

It has a great floral smell and just 2-3 drops is enough to cover your face/neck. Dewy Moisturizing Finish Laloirelle Luminous Face Oil - Organic Pomegranate Oil, Cacao Oil Infused W/Brightening White Peony Root, Marigold Flower, Lotus Leaf - Glowing Skin That Feels Hydrated, Plump and Firm - 1.0 fl oz Laloirelle {'Brand': 'Laloirelle', 'Scent': 'Pomegranate', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.36 x 2.32 inches; 4.55 Ounces'} Oof! I just can't get over the smell of this one. It could be a scent that others may find pleasurable, but not me. I can't find a specific smell it reminds me of...but think a deep nutty smell mixed with the smell of old leather? The scent dissipates a bit after you rub it into your skin, but it lingers just enough to bother me. But if you are a fan of those deep, woodsy, older scents, this might be for you.

I will say, it soaks extremely well into the skin, leaving you with a really nice matte finish that most other oils aren't capable of. Scent Is Not For Me Laloirelle Age Renewal Serum - Phyto-Biotics Stem Cells, Botanical Hyaluronic Acid, Retinol, Multi-Vitamin, Herbal Infusion - Organic serum for anti-aging, hydration, wrinkles, all skin types (1oz) Laloirelle {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Laloirelle', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Material Feature': 'Organic', 'Package Dimensions': '5.79 x 2.36 x 2.32 inches; 4.73 Ounces'} I'm so impressed by this natural serum. From the ingredients ... to the consistency & coverage. My skin soaks this right up in my nighttime skincare routine. The scent is amazing with bright floral notes. It's a win for me. Smells Amazing / Great Ingredients MAD | Cosmetic's Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, Daily cleansing face wipes to remove waterproof mascara, alcohol free , with Vitamin E 25 count JUST FOR TOTS BY MAD {'Brand': 'JUST FOR TOTS BY MAD', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Unit Count': '25.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 7.87 x 1.97 inches; 7.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '685757511926'} These are okay. They are definitely not heavy duty enough if you wear a lot of makeup. I occasionally throw on a little concealer or foundation before remote meetings on ZOOM, so these wipes work for me. However it still takes me about 4 wipes to get that small amount of makeup off.

I don't mind the scent, but I don't love it either.
Overall, I wouldn't brag about these wipes or go out of my way to recommend them, they're just okay. Not The Worst...Not The Best Short Afro Kinky Curly Headband Wig Ombre Wigs Headband Wig Head Wrap Wigs 2 in 1 Headband Wigs Mix Orange Turban Afro High Puff Wigs Synthetic Scarf Wigs INSTASTYLE {'Material': 'High Temperature Fiber', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Kinky', 'Style': 'Chic', 'Brand': 'INSTASTYLE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult'} This is cute. To me it gives the look of "threw my hair up to run to the store". Or just a quick updo. I guess you could dress it up with the hoop earrings it came with...But it's cute! The hair does have a slightly synthetic look to it...but it is synthetic, so what do you expect? Cute Ice Roller Massager Gel Eye Mask, Cooler Skin Roller for Face & Eye Cold Freezer Therapy Instant Pain Relief Reduce Puffy Dark Circles Migraines Stress Relief CONSGIJI {'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 3.54 x 2.36 inches; 11.11 Ounces', 'UPC': '046432534331'} I really love this eye mask. I keep mine in the freezer and have used it before virtual meetings or just before going out for the day to reduce the puffiness under my eyes. While the puffiness isn't 100% just magically gone, the mask definitely helps. It's also great for just putting you at ease for a bit. The roller, however, I am not the biggest fan of. For some reason when I cool it in the freezer, the roller literally freezes and no longer rolls unless I'm *really* applying pressure. I guess the roller is meant to be used on your back or legs, not your face. But overall, pretty satisfied! Not Bad! Love the Eye Mask Kidskin- Foaming Body Wash with Tea Tree Oil- Helps Combat Body and Foot Odor and Stubborn Body Acne and Skin Issues - Cruelty Free, Gluten Free, Paraben Free, Sulfate Free, Unscented, and Vegan- Made in USA Kidskin ['Kidskin Foaming Body Wash with Tea Tree Oil is designed exclusively for teens, tweens, pre teens, and boys and girls to work as an effective, yet gentle body wash. Natural ingredients like Allantoin and Bisabolol nourish beyond surface level, and penetrate into the lower levels of the skin for the deepest hydration possible, while active ingredient tea tree oil works to fight body acne and skin issues teens are commonly prone to. Unlike shower bars and other soaps, our products are designed to soothe problematic and compromised skin. With 100% Natural ingredients that are paraben, sulfate, fragrance, and gluten free, the Kidskin Foaming Body Wash with Tea Tree Oil is gentle enough for every day use. Our mission is to provide teens (like our own!) with a body wash that leaves them feeling fresh and confident so they can focus on what really matters- every day. Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Extract, Polysorbate-20, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, ^ Glycerin, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Sea Salt (Sodium Chloride), Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Allantoin, Bisabolol'] {'Item Form': 'Bar, Foam', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Kidskin', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 2.83 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '4012', 'UPC': '880628401263', 'Manufacturer': 'Kidskin'} I just wish this had more of a Tea Tree scent! I use Tea Tree Oil on my face and hair & love the benefits of it while equally loving the scent. I find that this particular body wash doesn't have the scent I love. My very first thought upon using it was that it smelled like a dog shampoo. And I don't mean that to be negative, as I still use it and continue to. It just smells more chemical than herbal, for my particular sense of smell. But I do like that it squeezes out as a lather and is super convenient to use in the shower. I wouldn't order it again but can see why someone else would! I say, give it a shot and see what you think. Wish it smelled more like tea tree oil O!GETi Vitamin C Foam Cleanser | Foaming Facial Cleanser, Perfect Pore Cleansing Foam, Face Wash for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Sebum Reducing, Moisture Control & Minimizing Pores, Korean Skin Care, Gift for Women, Paraben-free, 4.23 Oz (120g) O!GETi {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'O!GETi', 'Scent': 'Tangerine', 'Material Feature': 'Natural'} This cleanser is so smooth and silky on my face. It has a *very* faint citrusy scent, which I like as it's not overbearing at all. I am using this every morning before I put on my moisturizer and spf and have no complaints! Great ingredients list as well. No Complaints!
profile:
The user continues to prioritize versatile skincare products that seamlessly blend effectiveness with sensory enjoyment. Their recent interest in specific formulations underlines a thoughtful approach to addressing diverse skin concerns. This is further demonstrated by their enthusiasm for a new facial cleanser that features a pleasant, subtle citrus scent, reflecting their appreciation for natural aromas without overwhelming fragrances. Their positive evaluation of this product highlights their ongoing commitment to high-quality ingredients and formulations that cater to their skin type.

The user maintains a conscientious skincare regimen, favoring cruelty-free, gluten-free, and sulfate-free products, aligning with their ethical values and commitment to holistic self-care. The satisfaction expressed regarding the new cleanser, coupled with its smooth application and effective performance, illustrates their balanced perspective in valuing both practicality and sensory experiences.

Overall, the user's skincare journey showcases a discerning taste that actively seeks products supporting their well-being and self-expression. Their critical yet appreciative approach to product evaluation reinforces their desire for comfort and quality in personal care, as they navigate a regimen that resonates with their lifestyle and preferences. This continued exploration of effective yet enjoyable skincare solutions underpins their evolving routine and highlights a harmonious blend of functionality and aesthetic appeal.
